document_data.mainbody: '''''The Legend of Drizzt: The Halfling's Gem''''' (original title: '''''Forgotten Realms: The Legend of Drizzt, Volume 6: The Halfling's Gem''''') is the graphic novel version of [[R.A. Salvatore]]'s novel ''[[The Halfling's Gem]]''. It was originally published in three parts: ''The Legend of Drizzt: The Halfling's Gem'' #1–3.

document_data.Reprints: The ''The Legend of Drizzt: The Halfling's Gem Graphic Novel'' series was reprinted in March 2008 as a paperback and hardcover omnibus by [[wikipedia:en:Devil's Due Publishing|Devil's Due Publishing]]. It was released as a paperback omnibus in April 2017 by [[wikipedia:en:IDW Publishing|IDW Publishing]].
